Azure Login with username & password.description: Log in with user name and password. This doesn't work with Microsoft accounts or accounts that have two-factor authentication enabled

Azure Login with service principle.description: Log in with user name and password. This doesn't work with Microsoft accounts or accounts that have two-factor authentication enabled

Azure Account List.description: Get a list of subscriptions for the logged in account.

Azure Account Clear.description: Clear all subscriptions from the CLI's local cache.

Azure Account get-access-token.description: Get a token for utilities to access Azure.

Azure Account list-locations.description: List supported regions for the current subscription.

body: az account set --subscription "${1:Name or ID of subscription}"
Azure Account set.description: Set a subscription to be the current active subscription.
